questions.question: If the equivalent length of a 90° elbow is greater than the 45° elbow, the pressure loss across the 90° elbow is _________ the 45° elbow.
Losses for flow through valves and fittings are expressed in terms of ?

answers.b: equivalent length of a straight pipe

questions.question: The frictional loss from sudden contraction is proportional to the velocity head in the _____________ conduit.
